titles.title: Providing for consideration of the conference report to accompany the bill (H.R. 644) to reauthorize trade facilitation and trade enforcement functions and activities, and for other purposes, and providing for consideration of the Senate amendments to the bill (H.R. 2250) making appropriations for the Legislative Branch for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2016, and for other purposes.

Providing for consideration of the conference report to accompany the bill (H.R. 644) to reauthorize trade facilitation and trade enforcement functions and activities, and for other purposes, and providing for consideration of the Senate amendments to the bill (H.R. 2250) making appropriations for the Legislative Branch for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2016, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 114-378, by Mr. Cole.
Resolution provides for consideration of the conference report to accompany H.R. 644 and for consideration of the Senate amendments to H.R. 2250.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 80.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 560.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 236 - 177 (Roll no. 690).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 236 - 174 (Roll no. 691).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: Sets forth the rule for consideration of the conference report to accompany the bill (H.R. 644) to reauthorize trade facilitation and trade enforcement functions and activities, and for other purposes, and providing for consideration of the Senate amendments to the bill (H.R. 2250) making appropriations for the Legislative Branch for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2016.
